meta.description: Language labels for backend module DAM Backend belonging to extension 'dam'

languageKey.label: DAM Backend
DAM Backend
Configuration is still missing. Update Extension Manager Configuration
It is very likely DAM is being set up for the first time. Check out the options bellow and click the "Update" button to save your configuration.
DAM is correctly configured
Updater Script
UUID fields are OK and values have been successfully checked
Some table(s) are missing
While checking the system, it has been detected some table(s) are missing. You should open up the Install tool and run the "Compare" tool under "Database Analyser"
